      • processEditMapCommand

        public static boolean processEditMapCommand(GameMap gameMap,
                                            String command)
        Process editmap command from the user loads a map and changes the context to allow the user to execute map editor commands

        Creates a map file if it doesn't exist

        Parameters:
        gameMap - contains game state
        command - cli command from the user
        Returns:
        true if loaded map successfully

      • processLoadMapCommand

        public static boolean processLoadMapCommand(GameMap gameMap,
                                            String command)
        Processes loadmap command from the cli Loads a map file and changes context to start the game
        Parameters:
        gameMap - contains game state
        command - cli command from the user
        Returns:
        true if loaded map successfully

      • processGamePlayerCommand

        public static boolean processGamePlayerCommand(GameMap gameMap,
                                               String command)
        Process gameplayer commands from the cli Adds or removes players in the game state
        Parameters:
        gameMap - contains game state
        command - cli command from the user
        Returns:
        boolean to indicate status
